instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 hanging
threads.message: This board came dead. When I changed its SMC the board turned on. But once it's on it's very slow and the mouse pointer takes a long time to move anything. Also can you tell me why the display only shows 5 MP in its graphics[ATTACH type="full"]60733[/ATTACH]

threads.title: 820-00165 hanging
threads.message: Did you pick the SMC from 00165 donor board?

threads.title: 820-00165 hanging
threads.message:
No good, get correct chip.
SMC firmware is board dependent.

threads.title: 820-00165 hanging
threads.message:
is this SMC firmware issue
can I fix this using any other method like any software update

threads.title: 820-00165 hanging
threads.message:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://logi.wiki/index.php/SMC_flashing[/URL]

Much more easy to get correct SMC chip...
